title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both projects P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project item is not displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that when both P1 and P2 are selected, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Select both project P1 and project P2.
